testcase.name: Validate calculator webpage

testcase.system-out: Given i am navigated to "https://evilcalculator-5a169.web.app/" calculator page.passed When i validate "AC" color..................................................passed Then i should be able to see button with desire "Red".......................passed

testcase.name: Validate addition functionality
testcase.system-out: Given i am navigated to "https://evilcalculator-5a169.web.app/" calculator page.passed When i enter "5" and press "Addition" and enter "6".........................passed Then i should be able to see result as "11".................................passed

testcase.name: Validate addition functionality 2
testcase.system-out: Given i am navigated to "https://evilcalculator-5a169.web.app/" calculator page.passed When i enter "3" and press "Addition" and enter "11"........................passed Then i should be able to see result as "14".................................passed

testcase.name: Validate Subtraction functionality
testcase.system-out: Given i am navigated to "https://evilcalculator-5a169.web.app/" calculator page.passed When i enter "9" and press "Subtraction" and enter "2"......................passed Then i should be able to see result as "7"..................................passed

testcase.name: Validate Subtraction functionality 2
testcase.system-out: Given i am navigated to "https://evilcalculator-5a169.web.app/" calculator page.passed When i enter "6" and press "Subtraction" and enter "2"......................passed Then i should be able to see result as "4"..................................passed

testcase.name: Validate multiplication functionality
testcase.system-out: Given i am navigated to "https://evilcalculator-5a169.web.app/" calculator page.passed When i enter "4" and press "Multiplication" and enter "2"...................passed Then i should be able to see result as "8"..................................passed

testcase.name: Validate multiplication functionality 2
testcase.system-out: Given i am navigated to "https://evilcalculator-5a169.web.app/" calculator page.passed When i enter "3" and press "Multiplication" and enter "8"...................passed Then i should be able to see result as "24".................................passed

testcase.name: Validate division functionality
testcase.system-out: Given i am navigated to "https://evilcalculator-5a169.web.app/" calculator page.passed When i enter "9" and press "Division" and enter "2".........................passed Then i should be able to see result as "4.5"................................passed

testcase.name: Validate division functionality 2
